name: Counter Strike 1.6 Girl Edition
description:
In this Mod you will see:

-Girl Player Model

-Girl weapon 

-Girl Voice(Bots And you)

-New hud(main menu,Buy menu,Team menu)

-Skins(girlish skins) (same for weapon)

-Special skins :

-M4a1 Kitty

-Knife Flowers

-AK47 Pink Treat

-Grenades(FLash bang,He grenade,smoke) (rose grenades)

-Awp Pink stars

-Famas glow neo

And thats it

This mod took me 2 days to finish

So download it please :D(if u like the mod ofc!)

On 25 October it will be free for everyone 

Other notes

-New hostage skins

-The game will be updated in a few days
